import React, { Component } from "react"; class PasswordReset extends Component { state = {}; render() { return ( //
Password Reset
{/* */}
Phone numbers do not require special characters ("-" or "()")
Create New Password
{/* */}
Must be least 8 characters, a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, a number, no parts of your username.
{/* */}
{/* */}
Sent to phone number associated with your account.
); } } export default PasswordReset;
